0.text: Bug 118351  Predefine style in library cannot refresh in layout.

1.text: Details: Predefine style in library cannot refresh in layout  Step: 1.New a library and create two themes and two label predefine style with yellow and green background color.

2.text: Named theme1 and theme2, style1 and style2.

3.text: 2.Open a report design and insert a label.

4.text: Actual result: No matter what theme is selected, the background color has not been changed in layout.

5.text: Expected result: Select a theme, background color of label in layout is changed.
